alert.note: Alert for Hamblen; Hawkins; Northwest Cocke; Northwest Greene (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 04 at 5:12PM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Hawkins, north central Cocke, northwestern Greene and eastern Hamblen Counties through 700 PM EDT... At 612 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles southeast of Russellville, or 11 miles west of Greeneville, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Morristown, Greeneville, Bean Station, Russellville, Mosheim, Bulls Gap, Baileyton, McCloud, Romeo and Mooresburg. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Hamblen; Hawkins; Northwest Cocke; Northwest Greene
